page.title: 11Local Dialect; Papa Westray
page.content: Many old words are still used on Papa Westray, some examples of these are: Backlino..Walking backwards, , Chaa.. an infertile egg, Dell..to delve, Dugged..obstinate Dorty.. easily offended,Bir..strength Fla..Fault, Flegg..to frighten, Glaip..to gulp, Hix.. hiccough Illbest..best of a bad job, Iper..liquid effluent from a byre, Kloor..scratch, Lack..laugh, Looting..bend down, Madrum..anger, Keester..squeek, Nugan.. to nudge, Ouse..to ladle liquid,Peck.. pant, Pivver..quiver, Queyo..Young cow, Rausee..ragged or untidy, Shilpit..sour tasted,Tise..persuade, Trowey..sickly, Uncan..strange, Wint..habit, Wurs..belongs to us.
